markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Black Market Smuggler](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=74)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Golden Road

</column>

You know how to work the less-than-legal side of the region’s markets and know how to slip contraband past the authorities.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Wisdom
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) skill, and the [Underworld Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Experienced Smuggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=779) skill feat.
name: Black Market Smuggler

</summary>

text: Black Market Smuggler Source World Guide pg. 58 2.0 Region Golden Road You know how to work the less-than-legal side of the region’s markets and know how to slip contraband past the authorities. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Wisdom or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Stealth skill, and the Underworld Lore skill. You gain the Experienced Smuggler skill feat.
